name: College of Valor
description: Bards who inspire bravery and valor through tales of heroes, excelling as warriors and leaders.

3.Combat Inspiration: When a creature uses your Bardic Inspiration die, it can add the number rolled to a weapon damage roll, or add it to AC against one attack (before knowing if attack hits).
3.Bonus Proficiencies: You gain proficiency with Medium armor, Shields, and Martial weapons.

6.Extra Attack: You can attack twice, instead of once, when you take the Attack action on your turn.

14.Battle Magic: When you cast a Bard spell using an action, you can make one weapon attack as a Bonus Action.
